channel.title: I have 2 questions, any1 have answers? :)
channel.description:
1. How come when i go into connectedfrominfo and copy some1s ip into bannedips, they can still log on??
2. Whats the code for the command for resetting NPCs?
Thanks you ahead of time if you help me. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2008, 02:46:22 AM[/size][hr]hello? :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2008, 03:31:45 AM[/size][hr]help please?

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Okay, looking through the standard NPC class, try this.

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && playerRights >= 2) { for(NPC i : server.npcHandler.npcs) { if(i != null) { i.IsDead = true; i.actionTimer = 0; } else { continue; } } sendMessage("Successfully reset NPCs"); }

im not sure if it works but here is it

} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset") && playerRights > 0){ for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } yell("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName); }

item.title: I have 2 questions, any1 have answers? :)
item.dc:creator: @Kyle11594 Kyle11594
item.description:
@Kyle11594 wrote:

  1. When you paste it in the banned Ips … Put it on the next line down from the last banned IP then save the notepad thing.
    i.g.

Ip #1
Ip #2

Then click save.

Then kick the player so that they log off. Then they cant log back on. I dont know about the seconed one.

I hope that helpped.

Read full topic
